MRNA_PREPARATION_INITIAL_MRNA_QNTY: The Ribo Zero input is 0.2 µg of total RNA. The Ribo Zero Step is integrated in the library preparation protocol and has no separate amount measurement.
MRNA_PREPARATION_FRAGMENT_SIZE_RANGE: Size range is between 120 bp and 210 bp
EXTRACTION_PROTOCOL_MRNA_ENRICHMENT: TruSeq Stranded Total RNA Sample Prep (Apr 2013; Illumina RS-122-2301)
LIBRARY_GENERATION_PCR_POLYMERASE_TYPE: TruSeq Stranded Total RNA Sample Prep (Apr 2013; Illumina RS-122-2301)
LIBRARY_GENERATION_PCR_THERMOCYCLING_PRO: 98°C for 30 seconds 10 - 15 cycles (depending of qPCR Results) of:  98°C for 10 seconds  60°C for 30 seconds  72°C for 30 seconds 72°C for 5 minutes  Hold at 10°C from TruSeq Stranded Total RNA Sample Prep (Apr 2013; Illumina RS-122-2301)
RNA_PREPARATION_5'_RNA_ADAPTER_LIGATION_: TruSeq Stranded Total RNA Sample Prep (Apr 2013; Illumina RS-122-2301)
RNA_PREPARATION_5'_RNA_ADAPTER_SEQUENCE: TruSeq Stranded Total RNA Sample Prep (Apr 2013; Illumina RS-122-2301)
RNA_PREPARATION_3'_RNA_ADAPTER_SEQUENCE: TruSeq Stranded Total RNA Sample Prep (Apr 2013; Illumina RS-122-2301)
LIBRARY_GENERATION_PCR_TEMPLATE_CONC: TruSeq Stranded Total RNA Sample Prep (Apr 2013; Illumina RS-122-2301)
LIBRARY_GENERATION_PCR_PRIMER_CONC: TruSeq Stranded Total RNA Sample Prep (Apr 2013; Illumina RS-122-2301)
LIBRARY_GENERATION_PCR_R_PRIMER_SEQUENCE: TruSeq Stranded Total RNA Sample Prep (Apr 2013; Illumina RS-122-2301)
LIBRARY_GENERATION_PCR_PRODUCT_ISOLATION: The amplificated library is purified with AMPure XP Beads as is described in TruSeq Stranded Total RNA Sample Prep (Apr 2013; Illumina RS-122-2301)
RNA_PREPARATION_REVERSE_TRANSCRIPTION_PR: TruSeq Stranded Total RNA Sample Prep (Apr 2013; Illumina RS-122-2301)
TruSeq Stranded Total RNA Sample Prep (Apr 2013; Illumina RS-122-2301)
LIBRARY_GENERATION_PCR_NUMBER_CYCLES: The cycles for PCR amplification are adjusted according to the qPCR QC results (in most cases between 10 and 15 cycles).
